scripts.backend:dev: cd backend  && npm run build && cd ../backend-portal && npm run build && fis3 release backend:dev -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.backend:test: cd backend  && npm run build:test && cd ../backend-portal && npm run build && fis3 release backend:test -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend  && npm run build && cd ../frontend-portal && npm run build && fis3 release frontend:dev -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.frontend:test: cd frontend  && npm run build:test && cd ../frontend-portal && npm run build && fis3 release frontend:test -f ../fis-conf.js
scripts.all:dev: npm run backend:dev && npm run frontend:dev
scripts.all:test: npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
